Articles.Content:
You have been appointed head engineer for the Kerbal Space Centre. Your spacecraft warehouse is running out of space for new designs and your boss needs you to design a multi-purpose lander. Oh yeah, did I mention the Kerbal Space Centre is losing money because of all its recent failed missions (Im sure for anyone who attempts this it wont be the case, but we gotta have a story line ). Since this is the case you are not allowed to rendezvous or use an orbital tug at any point. Once you are in Kerbin orbit there should be no decouplers or docking ports left on your ship. So to make it clearer, 1 stage for landing, returning, orbital maneuvers and anything else you wanna do in space, this is why Kethane is advised. (Don't get me wrong, parachutes are allowed!)

  1. Get to every planet and moon in the Kerbol system
  2. Gain orbit around said planets
  3. Deorbit and land
  4. Take off again
  5. Regain orbit
  6. Return to Kerbin
  7. Then land at the Kerbal Space Centre

How to enter

All you need to do is post a pictures of it on all planets, picture of it on the launchpad and picture of it in Kerbin orbit.

If you want to win other rewards post a picture of the cost and or weight of your ship.

Exceptions:

You will not have to take off again from Eve Or Laythe.

You do not have to land on Jool.

Extra Info:

Kethane is reccomended or this will be insanely hard!

Don't get confused, you don't have to get to every planet then back to Kerbin, its just to one planet and back, but for every one.

Rules

No cheats from the debug console or Hyperedit.

Mechjeb is allowed.

Protractor, Kerbal alarm clock or any other informative or node helper mods are allowed and no points are subtracted for use of these.

Part clipping is allowed.

Mods are allowed (Remember to look in the rules section)

Points

10 Points for every planet your lander is able to land on.

50 points if your lander can get back from Eve.

25 points if your lander can get back from Laythe.

25 points if Kethane is not used.

- 10 points for every mod part used in your lander.

10 Points if no mod items are used.

- 10 points if Mechjeb is used.

20 points for each Kerbal to set foot on the planets.

Rules

Judged by amount of points.

  1. Vacant
  2. Vacant
  3. Vacant
  4. Vacant
  5. Vacant
  6. Vacant
  7. Vacant
  8. Vacant
  9. Vacant
  10. Vacant

Weight Award

No one yet

Price award

And again, no one yet

Entrants

This is my first ever post so i would appreciate any comments or suggestions, or if you notice a mistake don't hesitate to tell me.

If you don't understand just ask.

(Oh and before you ask, no i'm not going to enter because i will just embarrass myself)

Edited October 3, 2013 by MisterDurk

Yeah.. they are different yours is to get from Kerbin to all the planets then back mine is to get to one then back and restart and go to a different one but with the same design and no tugs or anything, you obviously haven't read mine properly.
